description: World of Tanks,  , , WN6, WN7, WN8     ,     .  -------------------              .               .  -        -        -                     -  , WN6 - WN8        -        -      -      -       ,     -        === World of Tanks and Wargaming.net are registered trademarks or trademarks of Wargaming.net LLP. WoT Progress app is in no way associated with Wargaming.net. The application allows you to view detailed statistics of the game World of Tanks, ratings of RE, Bronesite, WN6, WN7, WN8 and monitor its changes, updating information after the game session. ------------------- There is the possibility of adding to track multiple profiles while maintaining progress for each of them. In addition to detailed statistics, there are graphs of the distribution of parameters by level and progress for the main ratings.  - Convenient search for players in all available regions - Ability to add multiple players to the database - Detailed statistics with popular efficiency formulas in the form of organically grouped parameters in cards and tracking the impact of gaming sessions on statistics - Ratings of RE, WN6 - WN8 and main indicators for each players tank - Timeline gaming sessions with views of the main ratings - Details of each session - Game sessions on a separate technique - Charts of distribution of ratings and indicators by levels, nations and classes of equipment - Charts to track progress for gaming sessions === World of Tanks and Wargaming.net are registered trademarks or trademarks of Wargaming.net LLP. WoT Progress app is in no way associated with Wargaming.net.
